sections.In the books: Unlike Houses [[House Whitehill|Whitehill]] and Forrester, which both appear in the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Branfield is an invention of ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]''.

'''House Branfield''' is a minor noble house from the south of [[Westeros]]. After the fall of [[House Targaryen]], House Branfield lost all its lands and titles, with most of its members executed. Today, only two known members of House Branfield are still alive, [[Elissa Forrester|Elissa Branfield]] and [[Malcolm Branfield]].
sections.Members:
*Lord {Branfield} - the head of the House.
**Lady {[[Talia Branfield]]} - his lady wife.
***Lady [[Elissa Forrester|Elissa Branfield]] - his daughter, widow of the late Lord [[Gregor Forrester]].
***[[Malcolm Branfield]] - his son, the last living male member of House Branfield.
sections.History:
===Background===
House Branfield is a minor southron house. They fought for [[House Targaryen]] during [[Robert's Rebellion]], after which all of their lands and titles were taken from them. Elissa Branfield had married [[Gregor Forrester]], heir to [[House Forrester]] of [[Ironrath]], some time before the rebellion. She was torn between the loyalty of both houses, but ultimately chose House Forrester. Elissa's brother, Malcolm, has never married or had children, ensuring the eventual extinction of the house. <ref>http://www.telltalegames.com/blog/discussion/86265</ref>

Lady Elissa reminisces about how her father's house was once a mighty house like House Forrester, but their loyalty to House Targaryen cost them dearly, which resulted in most of the house being killed.
